property.name: fatherName
property.formula: (SELECT FARMER.LAST_NAME FROM FARMER WHERE FARMER.FARMER_ID=FARMER_ID LIMIT 1)

property.name: farm
property.formula: (SELECT FARM.FARM_NAME FROM FARM WHERE FARM.FARM_CODE =FARM_ID)

property.name: branchId
property.formula: (SELECT FARMER.BRANCH_ID FROM FARMER WHERE FARMER.FARMER_ID = FARMER_ID LIMIT 1)

class.name: com.sourcetrace.eses.order.entity.txn.AgentBalanceReport
class.subselect:
SELECT trxn_agro.ID, trxn_agro.RECEIPT_NO, trxn_agro.AGENT_ID, trxn_agro.AGENT_NAME, trxn_agro.FARMER_ID, trxn_agro.FARMER_NAME, trxn_agro.SERVICE_POINT_NAME, trxn_agro.TXN_TYPE, trxn_agro.INT_BAL, trxn_agro.TXN_AMT, trxn_agro.BAL_AMT, trxn_agro.TXN_TIME, trxn_agro.TXN_DESC, trxn_agro.PROF_TYPE, ese_account.ACC_NO, ese_account.ACC_TYPE
FROM trxn_agro INNER JOIN ese_account ON ese_account.PROFILE_ID = trxn_agro.AGENT_ID WHERE ese_account.TYPEE = '1' AND trxn_agro.PROF_TYPE != '02' AND ( trxn_agro.TXN_TYPE IS NULL OR (trxn_agro.TXN_TYPE !='329' AND trxn_agro.TXN_TYPE !='514' AND trxn_agro.TXN_TYPE !='345' )) AND trxn_agro.OPER_TYPE = 1 ORDER BY trxn_agro.TXN_TIME DESC

class.name: com.sourcetrace.eses.order.entity.txn.FarmerBalanceReport
class.subselect:
SELECT trxn_agro.ID, trxn_agro.RECEIPT_NO, trxn_agro.AGENT_ID, trxn_agro.AGENT_NAME, trxn_agro.FARMER_ID, trxn_agro.FARMER_NAME, trxn_agro.SERVICE_POINT_NAME, trxn_agro.TXN_TYPE, trxn_agro.INT_BAL, trxn_agro.TXN_AMT, trxn_agro.BAL_AMT, trxn_agro.TXN_TIME, trxn_agro.TXN_DESC, trxn_agro.ESE_ACCOUNT_ID, ese_account.ACC_NO, ese_account.ACC_TYPE
FROM trxn_agro INNER JOIN ese_account ON ese_account.PROFILE_ID = trxn_agro.FARMER_ID WHERE ese_account.TYPEE = '3' AND trxn_agro.PROF_TYPE = '02' AND trxn_agro.OPER_TYPE = 1 ORDER BY trxn_agro.TXN_TIME DESC

property.name: farmerName
property.formula: (select GROUP_CONCAT(Farmer.first_name) from Farmer where Farmer.farmer_id = farmer_id AND Farmer.STATUS_CODE = 0 LIMIT 1)

property.name: farmerCode
property.formula: (SELECT FARMER.FARMER_CODE FROM FARMER WHERE FARMER.FARMER_ID=FARMER_ID AND FARMER.STATUS_CODE = 0 LIMIT 1)

property.name: farmName
property.formula: (SELECT DISTINCT FARM.FARM_NAME FROM FARM WHERE FARM.ID=FARM_ID LIMIT 1)

property.name: farmCode
property.formula: (SELECT DISTINCT FARM.FARM_CODE FROM FARM WHERE FARM.ID=FARM_ID LIMIT 1)

property.name: farmerTraceId
property.formula: (SELECT FARMER.TRACE_ID FROM FARMER WHERE FARMER.FARMER_ID=FARMER_ID AND FARMER.STATUS_CODE = 0 LIMIT 1)

property.name: farmerTraceNet
property.formula: (SELECT FARMER.FRAMER_CODE_BY_TRCAENET FROM FARMER WHERE FARMER.FARMER_ID=FARMER_ID AND FARMER.STATUS_CODE = 0 LIMIT 1)

property.name: fatherName
property.formula: (SELECT FARMER.LAST_NAME FROM FARMER WHERE FARMER.FARMER_ID = FARMER_ID LIMIT 1)

property.name: fatherName
property.formula: (SELECT FARMER.LAST_NAME FROM FARMER WHERE FARMER.FARMER_ID = FARMER_ID LIMIT 1)

property.name: fatherName
property.formula: (SELECT FARMER.LAST_NAME FROM FARMER WHERE FARMER.FARMER_ID = FARMER_ID LIMIT 1)

property.name: villageName
property.formula: (SELECT v.name FROM village v where v.id=VILLAGE_ID)

property.name: usageLevelName
property.formula: (SELECT CATALOGUE_VALUE.NAME FROM CATALOGUE_VALUE WHERE CATALOGUE_VALUE.CODE = USAGE_LEVEL)

property.name: groupName
property.formula: (SELECT w.NAME FROM WAREHOUSE w WHERE w.CODE=GROUP_ID)

property.name: fatherName
property.formula: (SELECT FARMER.LAST_NAME FROM FARMER WHERE FARMER.FARMER_ID=FARMER_ID LIMIT 1)

property.name: farmerName
property.formula: (select GROUP_CONCAT(Farmer.first_name) from farmer where FIND_IN_SET(Farmer.farmer_id,farmer_id) AND FARMER.STATUS_CODE = 0 LIMIT 1)

property.name: farmerCode
property.formula: (SELECT FARMER.FARMER_CODE FROM FARMER WHERE FARMER.FARMER_ID=FARMER_ID AND FARMER.STATUS_CODE = 0 LIMIT 1)

property.name: farmerOrgName
property.formula: (select GROUP_CONCAT(WAREHOUSE.NAME) from WAREHOUSE where FIND_IN_SET(WAREHOUSE.CODE,COOPEARTIVE_CODE LIMIT 1) )

property.name: farmName
property.formula: (SELECT DISTINCT FARM.FARM_NAME FROM FARM WHERE FARM.FARM_CODE=FARM_ID LIMIT 1)

property.name: farmerOrgCode
property.formula: (SELECT DISTINCT WAREHOUSE.CODE FROM WAREHOUSE WHERE WAREHOUSE.ID=COOPEARTIVE_CODE)

hibernate-mapping.sql-query:
SELECT `f`.`ID` AS `ID`, `f`.`FARMER_ID` AS `FARMERID`, `f`.`FIRST_NAME` AS `FIRSTNAME`, `f`.`BRANCH_ID` AS `BRANCHID`, `f`.`LAST_NAME` AS `LASTNAME`, `f`.`FARMER_CODE` AS `FARMERCODE`, ( SELECT count(`d`.`ID`) FROM `distribution` `d` WHERE ( `d`.`FARMER_ID` = `f`.`FARMER_ID` ) AND `d`.TXN_TIME BETWEEN :startDate AND :endDate ) AS `DIST_COUNT`,
( SELECT count(`p`.`ID`) FROM `procurement` `p` INNER JOIN trxn_agro tx WHERE (`p`.`FARMER_ID` = `f`.`ID`) AND tx.ID = p.TRXN_AGRO_ID AND tx.TXN_TIME BETWEEN :startDate AND :endDate ) AS `PROC_COUNT`,
( SELECT count(0) FROM ( `periodic_inspection` `pins` JOIN `farm` `frm` ON ( ( `frm`.`FARM_CODE` = `pins`.`FARM_ID` ) ) ) WHERE (`frm`.`FARMER_ID` = `f`.`ID`) AND pins.INSPECTION_DATE BETWEEN :startDate AND :endDate ) AS `PERIODIC_COUNT`,
( SELECT count(`ts`.`ID`) FROM `training_status` `ts` WHERE ( `ts`.`FARMER_ID` LIKE concat('%', `f`.`FARMER_ID`, '%') AND ts.TRAINING_DATE BETWEEN :startDate AND :endDate ) ) AS `TRAIN_COUNT`, (getDynamicTxn(f.id)) AS DYNAMIC_COUNT
FROM `farmer` `f` WHERE `f`.STATUS_CODE = '0' and f.status='1'

property.name: cordinates
property.formula: (SELECT concat(EVENT_REPORT.LATITUDE,',', EVENT_REPORT.LONGITUDE) FROM EVENT_REPORT WHERE EVENT_REPORT.ID=ID )
